resources:
// Application Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer HHS Moodle Used permission \"Access storage\" permission:
• Lists: creating and storing.
• Backup: backup and restore databases.
• Downloads: save downloads on the sd-card.
• Screenshots: save screenshots of a website on the sd-card.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> Grant permission\". Used permission Manage \"Do not disturb\":
This is used to set your phone in silent mode during lessons.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> Do not disturb\". Share screenshot using: Share image using: Share link using: Choose file with: header splashscreen Confirmation Attachment My Moodle Please wait … Closing app. // Moodle Dashboard Profile Calendar Ratings Notifications Settings School homepage Web search Moodle Check Clock // About About HHS Moodle Developer Used open source libraries Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Used for the file picker. Used to build the intro screen. Used to encrypt pin (for app protection). Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. // IntroScreen HHS Moodle Thanks for choosing HHS Moodle. Please read the following introduction carefully. You can reach all important functions by swiping from the left to the middle of your screen. Bookmarks Create your own personal bookmarks for each visited site. Todo lists Create todo lists. Sort them by priority or let you show notifications in the status bar. Notes Create notes. You can also receive text (e.g. links) from other apps. Tools Calculate your grades, create course lists or … Help Over the menu you can reach a help dialog on every screen. Settings Configure the app to your fittings. Security All databases and your login data are decrypted. Create a pin to protect the app against unwanted usage. Login Enter your Moodle login data on the next screen. You will be logged in automatically in future. You can edit your login data in the settings. Schedule Create your schedule, so that your phone does not ring during lessons. // Login Username Password Please enter username and password. Automatic login. Does not work: edit login data? // Tab - Titles Bookmarks Notes // Menu Items Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Open link in external browser Copy link to clipboard Save screenshot Settings Open app folder Add bookmark Help Tools Sort entries Sort by title Sort by icon Sort by creation Sort by Attachment Sort by notification Search in titles Search in content Search in creation dates Search in URLs Search in attachments // Context Menu Save image Share image Open in external browser Link successfully copied Saving image as: // Settings App settings Permissions | About | Help Security Login data (Moodle) Please enter your Moodle username and password to get automatically logged in. App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). Main screen Which tab should be displayed as default on the main screen? About Learn more about the app (changelog, license, used libraries, …). Pin (App access) Set a pin to protect app against unwanted access. Only use numbers. Let empty, if you do not want to protect the app (own risk). Problems? Send me a mail. Font size Change font size for websites. Help menu Disable all help menus in the app. Backup Backup and restore your databases (notes, bookmarks, …). A new backup overwrites the old one. Automatic backup Always backup all databases (Todo, bookmarks, …), when leaving the app. Shortcuts Create shortcuts on your desktop for fast access to main functions of the app (Bookmarks, todo lists, …). Silent mode Set your phone in silent mode during lessons. If you use Android Nougat or newer you need to permit \"Do not disturb\" below. Restore // Snackbar OK Cancel Never show Downloading file: Do you want to download: Download completed. Open folder manager? Permissions granted? Uuups. Wrong password. Shortcut successfully created. Backup failed. Restore failed. Failed to create screenshot. No supported file extension Please install an app to perform action. Title already exists. There\'s no entry in the list. // Bookmarks Delete entry Adding entry. Successfully set as favorite. You can only choose one favorite. Edit title Create note Create calendar event Create shortcut // Notes Note will be removed. OK? Delete note Edit note Share note Share note using: Normal Low High Title Content // Password Pin (only numbers) Pin forgotten? Do you want to delete all user data (also login data, saved bookmarks, notes, …) to reset your app pin? The application will close. //File chooser Choose Cancel Open Share Rename Delete New filename (without file extension) Do you really want to delete the file? Edit filename Choose attachment // Camera Failed to take picture Picture saved // Grade 100 Max. credits Please enter maximal credits. Grades calculation Percent Credits Grade // Number Random generator Error. Have you chosen a file? Error reading file. Random number Enter number … First enter a number … … then press \"ok\". Edit entry Chosen: Please enter data to the list. // ToDo Todo From course list Custom title New entry … Create todo list Entry deleted Restore? Share list Paste actual date Paste actual time // CourseList Course lists From text file Create todo list Create note Create random list Create course list Create subject // Schedule Weekend Schedule --- --- Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Search by teachers Search by rooms From subject list Show todo list Show notes // Subjects Subjects Name Teacher Room Edit subject Red Pink Purple Blue Teal Green Lime Yellow Orange Brown Grey
